content.raw:
baila,

Can you please just run this again?

```
sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get upgrade

sudo apt-get install build-essential cmake libusb-dev lsb-release mercurial pkg-config python ignition-blueprint ros-melodic-desktop \
ros-melodic-tf2-sensor-msgs ros-melodic-robot-localization ros-melodic-ros-control ros-melodic-twist-mux ros-melodic-rotors-control \
python3-vcstool python3-colcon-common-extensions mercurial ros-melodic-ros1-ign -y

sudo reboot
```
content.html:
baila,

Can you please just run this again?

sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get upgrade

sudo apt-get install build-essential cmake libusb-dev lsb-release mercurial pkg-config python ignition-blueprint ros-melodic-desktop \
ros-melodic-tf2-sensor-msgs ros-melodic-robot-localization ros-melodic-ros-control ros-melodic-twist-mux ros-melodic-rotors-control \
python3-vcstool python3-colcon-common-extensions mercurial ros-melodic-ros1-ign -y

sudo reboot
